page.title: 18 Employment.
page.content: One of the great concerns of people in the area is the high incidence of unemployment which is in the region of 17%. The town received a shattering blow a few years ago when the main factory employing over 300 people closed. Attempts at attracting a new employer to take over the works sited on the south bank of the Wye have failed. Local councillors have striven to attract new industries to the area,but still many of the young people leave the area to seek employment elsewhere. Tourism has been suggested as a means of coping with the problem of lack of employment.There is only 1 hotel in our block and few bed and breakfast residences.The old Priory Street School has been converted into a Youth Hostel and receives visitors from all over the world.
